## glab release

Create, view and manage releases

### Synopsis

Create, view and manage releases

```
glab release <command> [flags]
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help          help for release
  -R, --repo string   Select another repository using the OWNER/REPO format or the project ID. Supports group namespaces
```
